name: Infinity Bullet
description:
Infinity Bullet is a simple vertical shoot-em-up bullet survival game.

Features:

  • 3 difficulty settings starting the game at different speed
  • Increasing game speed
  • Massive score multipliers

Credits:

  • Sami Kaisanlahti (Design, art, music)

Sounds:

  • Nbs Dark
  • peridactyloptrix
